download portable version(community server):
	https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/mysql/

installer:
	https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/installer/

index:
	https://dev.mysql.com/downloads/
# mysql requires vc runtime, install vc_x64 first
add system veriables to path;

configure my.ini at program root folder;
----my.ini----
# For advice on how to change settings please see
# http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.7/en/server-configuration-defaults.html
# *** DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. It's a template which will be copied to the
# *** default location during install, and will be replaced if you
# *** upgrade to a newer version of MySQL.
 
[mysqld]
#skip-grant-tables 
# Remove leading # and set to the amount of RAM for the most important data
# cache in MySQL. Start at 70% of total RAM for dedicated server, else 10%.
# innodb_buffer_pool_size = 128M
 
# Remove leading # to turn on a very important data integrity option: logging
# changes to the binary log between backups.
# log_bin
 
# These are commonly set, remove the # and set as required.
# basedir = .....
# datadir = .....
# port = .....
# server_id = .....
basedir ="D:\Mysql\mysql-8.0.12-winx64"   # 设置mysql的安装目录 
datadir ="D:\Mysql\mysql-8.0.12-winx64\data"   # 设置mysql数据库的数据的存放目录，必须是data，或者是//xxx/data  
 
 
# Remove leading # to set options mainly useful for reporting servers.
# The server defaults are faster for transactions and fast SELECTs.
# Adjust sizes as needed, experiment to find the optimal values.
# join_buffer_size = 128M
# sort_buffer_size = 2M
# read_rnd_buffer_size = 2M 
 
sql_mode=NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION,STRICT_TRANS_TABLES 
 
#服务端的编码方式
character-set-server=utf8mb4
[client]
#客户端编码方式，最好和服务端保存一致
loose-default-character-set=utf8mb4
 
[WinMySQLadmin]  
Server = "D:\Mysql\mysql-8.0.12-winx64\bin\mysqld.exe"
----end----
set basedir,datadir,server;

initialize:
	:: run as admin
	mysqld --initialize-insecure --user=mysql

install service:
	mysqld -install
	:: remove mysqld -remove

start service:
	net start mysql
	:: stop service net stop mysql

login mysql:
	::comunity server has no preset passwords,just press enter
	mysql -u root -p

change passwords:
	ALTER USER 'root'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED WITH mysql_native_password BY 'newpasswords';
	flush privileges;
	exit;

references:
	https://blog.csdn.net/qq_39135287/article/details/82117234
